name: Dynamite Mommy
description:
Created for Mother's Day Jam 2015

Your good for nothing deadbeat ex-husband and his new mistress have taken your kid hostage once again.

Get in there, kick some ass and rescue your dear little one !!! You will need to collect his koala bear plushie in the way there ;-)

Expect some heavy resistance !!!

Controls:

* Arrow keys or A-D to move

* Space to jump (hold to float)

* Left control or left click to shoot

* Left shift to change weapon
